title: What Is My Chart Ruler in Astrology? How to Find Your Chart Ruler & What It Means

steps.title: Find out what time you were born and the city of your birth.
steps.content: Find out what time you were born and the city of your birth. [2] X Expert Source Kyle Thomas Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 March 2025. You may not know off the top of your head, but this is essential information for your birth chart. Ask your parents for details or look at your birth certificate to confirm the exact time and place where you were born. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Plug your information into an online astrology birth chart calculator.
steps.content: Plug your information into an online astrology birth chart calculator. There are hundreds if not thousands of astrology calculators you can choose from. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Simply search “astrology birth chart calculator,” click a link, put in your information, and presto! You have your very own birth chart.

steps.title: Locate your rising sign.
steps.content: Locate your rising sign. The rising sign or ascendant is on the left side of your birth chart or zodiac wheel, labeled with “AC.” The zodiac sign that is in this section is your rising sign. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Determine the ruling planet of your rising sign.
steps.content: Determine the ruling planet of your rising sign. Each zodiac has a natural ruler that governs its characteristics. The ruling planet of your rising sign is your chart ruler. Follow this guide to learn what your chart ruler is: [6] X Expert Source Kyle Thomas Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 March 2025. Aries: Mars Taurus: Venus Gemini: Mercury Cancer: Moon Leo: Sun Virgo: Mercury Libra: Venus Scorpio: Pluto Sagittarius: Jupiter Capricorn: Saturn Aquarius: Uranus Pisces: Neptune

steps.title: Mars:
steps.content: Mars: Aries Rising. [7] X Expert Source Kyle Thomas Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 March 2025. You’re a ball of unstoppable energy. Nothing is too far for you to achieve, especially when you know you’ll have an audience. You’re always looking for new opportunities, and aren’t afraid to take charge. [8] X Research source Represents: Action Planet symbol: ♂ Zodiac symbol: ♈

steps.title: Venus:
steps.content: Venus: Taurus Rising and Libra Rising. [9] X Expert Source Kyle Thomas Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 March 2025. You gravitate toward pleasing aesthetics and the arts. Beauty is no hidden thing for you as you’ll go out of your way to obtain it. You also value balance and are extremely loyal, which can help you in your desire to find partnership. Represents: Beauty Planet symbol: ♀ [10] X Research source Zodiac symbols: ♉ and ♎

steps.title: Mercury:
steps.content: Mercury: Virgo Rising and Gemini Rising. You’re reasonable and friendly. You value other people’s opinions and are not afraid to express your own, especially in intellectual conversation. [11] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Friendship means the world to you, and you love getting to know new people. Represents: Communication Planet symbol: ☿ Zodiac symbols: ♍ and ♊

steps.title: Moon:
steps.content: Moon: Cancer Rising. Your sympathetic nature draws you to protect others. Loyalty is at the top of your list, and you’ll stop at nothing when it comes to keeping your friends from harm. But your protective nature comes with mood swings, just as the Moon comes with phases. Represents: Emotions Planet symbol: ☾ Zodiac symbol: ♋

steps.title: Sun:
steps.content: Sun: Leo Rising. You like to be on center stage. Rather than shrinking away from attention, you gravitate towards it. You’re a ball of ambitious light who takes pride in everything. Confidence has never been a problem for you. Represents: Self Planet symbol: ☉ Zodiac symbol: ♌

steps.title: Jupiter:
steps.content: Jupiter: Sagittarius Rising. You’re always looking for the next adventure. Knowledge is power, and you love learning everything you possibly can. You think deeply and jump at the first chance to do something new. Your positive energy is contagious. Represents: Expansion Planet symbol: ♃ Zodiac symbol: ♐

steps.title: Saturn:
steps.content: Saturn: Capricorn Rising. You’re a strict rule follower. The last thing you want to do is cause a scene or make a mistake. You do everything by the book and may work best with a team. Represents: Structure Planet symbol: ♄ Zodiac symbol: ♑

steps.title: Uranus:
steps.content: Uranus: Aquarius Rising. You have more on your mind than what others may think. You’re wise, curious, and a natural-born leader. Taking charge is no small task for you, and you believe anything is possible as long as you set your mind to it. Represents: Revolution Planet symbol: ⛢ Zodiac symbol: ♒

steps.title: Neptune:
steps.content: Neptune: Pisces Rising. You’re extremely empathetic. You feel things on a deeply spiritual and emotional level. Your open mind makes you naturally artistic, and you may find solace in creatively expressing yourself and others. Represents: Spirituality Planet symbol: ♆ Zodiac symbol: ♓

steps.title: Pluto:
steps.content: Pluto: Scorpio Rising. You’ve most likely never been afraid of the dark. You have a natural intensity about you, but you’re secretly lovable. Peace doesn’t come easily for you as you’re in a constant state of existential crisis. You’re constantly evolving as you uncover more about yourself. Represents: Transformation Planet symbol: ♇ Zodiac symbol: ♏
